title: List of Tales of Wells Fargo episodes
text:
"<a href="Tales%20of%20Wells%20Fargo">Tales of Wells Fargo</a>" is an American <a href="Western%20%28genre%29">western</a> television series starring <a href="Dale%20Robertson">Dale Robertson</a> that ran from 1957 to 1962 on <a href="NBC">NBC</a>. Produced by <a href="Revue%20Productions">Revue Productions</a>, the series aired in a half-hour format until its final season when it expanded to an hour and switched from <a href="Black%20and%20white%23Media">black and white</a> to <a href="Color%20television">color</a>.
Series overview.
<onlyinclude></onlyinclude>
Episodes.
Season 1 (1957).
Season 1 consisted of 30 minute episodes in black & white, airing 8:30–9:00 on Monday nights.
Season 2 (1957–58).
Season 2 consisted of 30 minute episodes in black & white, airing 8:30–9:00 on Monday nights.
Season 3 (1958–59).
Season 3 consisted of 30 minute episodes in black & white, airing 8:30–9:00 on Monday nights.
Season 4 (1959–60).
Season 4 consisted of 30 minute episodes in black & white, airing 8:30–9:00 on Monday nights.
Season 5 (1960–61).
Season 5 consisted of 30 minute episodes in black & white, airing 8:30–9:00 on Monday nights.
Season 6 (1961–62).
In season 6, the show converted to 60 minute episodes in color, and moved to a Saturday night 7:30–8:30 time slot.
